title: What Else Doth Passeth All Understanding?
post: As students some 50 years ago we pulled some fairly weird stunts around April 1st, but you’ve got a doozey here. I’m guessing this one’s email address is whoever@happyfarm.org.co, diagnosis messianic complex perhaps.
author: daveb of wellington nz

title: What Else Doth Passeth All Understanding?
post: I cannot comprehend how this is possible since no one knows for certain whose image in on the Shroud.  Further, since the DNA is degraded, how do they propose to even test anything?  Good answer Dave.
author: Andy Weiss
